# Band Website SPA - Development Instructions

## Project Overview
Lightweight single-page application for a band website using vanilla JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3.

## Project Structure
- `index.html` - Main HTML structure
- `css/styles.css` - Styling and responsive design
- `js/app.js` - Client-side routing and interactivity
- `assets/` - Images and media files

## Development Guidelines
- Keep dependencies minimal - vanilla JS only
- Ensure responsive design for mobile/tablet/desktop
- Use semantic HTML5 elements
- Implement smooth scrolling navigation
- Optimize images and assets for web performance
